sources.title: The Proud and the Damned
sources.description: This film has fallen into the Public Domain.

sources.title: 1972 - The Proud and Damned - Haunted by war, they still found something worth fighting for!
sources.description:
In 1870, five ex-Confederate soldiers get embroiled in a foreign civil war south of the border.

Original title: The Proud and Damned (1972) AKA:  Welcome bastardi!

Director & Writer: Ferde Grofé Jr.
Actors: Chuck Connors, Aron Kincaid, Cesar Romero, José Greco

Genres: Drama, Western
Release date: July 1972 
Filming location: Colombia

sources.title: The Proud and Damned (1972)
sources.description: A group of five Confederate mercenaries led by Sergeant Will Hansen must choose sides carefully in a small village where they find themselves trapped in the middle of a rebellion. The group is torn as to whether they should honor the powerful military dictator who forces them to spy for him or help the local village fight for its independence. Follow Sergeant Hansen and his men as they make a decision that could cost them their lives. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-proud-and-damned-1972/

metadata.Plot: A group of five Confederate mercenaries led by Sergeant Will Hansen must choose sides carefully in a small village where they find themselves trapped in the middle of a rebellion. The group is torn as to whether they should honor the powerful military dictator who forces them to spy for him or help the local village fight for its independence. Follow Sergeant Hansen and his men as they make a decision that could cost them their lives.
metadata.Actors: Chuck Connors, Aron Kincaid, Cesar Romero
